Series M

BMW M GmbH, formerly known as BMW Motorsport GmbH, is a subsidiary of BMW AG that manufactures performance cars. … The BMW 1 Series-based M cars is called the BMW 1 Series M Coupe to avoid confusion with the original BMW M1. List of cars. Current M cars. M2 - G87 coupé (2023-)

Read more on Wikipedia
